entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
